alert.note: Alert for Northern Lake County; Southern Lake County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 6:16PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Lake County through 700 PM EDT... At 616 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over The Villages, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Leesburg, Eustis, Tavares, Lady Lake, and Howey-In-the-hills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or hard-topped vehicle. Remember, when thunder roars, go indoors!

area.areaDesc: Northern Lake County; Southern Lake County
